mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (member_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW())
INSERT INTO cart_item (cart_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{cartId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT ci.id AS id, ci.cart_id AS cartId, ci.product_id AS productId, ci.quantity AS quantity, p.name AS productName, p.price AS price, p.image_url AS imageUrl FROM cart_item ci JOIN product p ON ci.product_id = p.id WHERE ci.cart_id = #{cartId}
SELECT * FROM cart_item WHERE cart_id = #{cartId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.delete: DELETE ci FROM cart_item ci JOIN cart c ON ci.cart_id = c.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, created_at FROM cart WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
